vcita is a complete business management solution designed to help busy business owners stay organized and deliver exceptional client experiences.

Automate time-consuming admin tasks like payment collection & billing, scheduling, client interactions, and marketing communication, all from one place. 

vcita's easy-to-use and intuitive software allows businesses to:
* Get paid on time
* Gain and retain clients
* Stay organized and productive
* Market like a pro

Main features of vcita's all-in-one business management software:
* CRM: client cards, client communication & history
* Estimates, invoicing and billing
* Payment collection & processing
* Online scheduling and calendar management
* SMS & email marketing campaigns
* Automated reminders
* Secure and personalized client portal
* Lead capture
* Documents & files

Join more than 100,000 businesses worldwide that use vcita to better their business.

initial_reviews.review_title: Makes my life easier
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about vcita?
Very easy to configure and a very friendly team to clarify any queries I had.
The level of customisation for my business in what regards services, it's soooo flexible.
The fact that I can connect it with Office365
Multiple online payment options for my clients
Widget to set on my own website
Customer Portal and Chat feature
Option to select other languages than english
Customisation of every notification
Automates most of my business daily tasks
Support team is great!

What do you dislike about vcita?
Nothing, but I'd love the option to allow multiple languages to be set in parallel
Would also like to have the possibility to generate invoices for already paid services, for tax purposes.

What problems is vcita solving and how is that benefiting you?
I tested dozen of similar platforms and none would fully fit my needs. With vcita I was able to gather almost 100% of my needs and it makes my life so much easier with the level of customisation that it has. I can configure my services, packs, synch my calendars, offer multiple payment options, have the widget on my website and make use of the links to set up specific offers straight into my website. I also love the Customer Portal and how easy it is to chat and share documents with my clients.

all_reviews.review_content:

The customizable pop up widget is wonderful to get potential client engagement.  I first used it to encourage people to book a ten minute free visit with me.  I definitely noticed an increase in remote clients/patients after installing the widget. The Facebook and Contact page widgets are also awesome as people can book right through either page.  I love that is syncs with Google Calendar.  The invoicing function keeps improving and the increase flexibility is helpful including the ability to give a discount.  The customer service team is very responsive and even sat down with me for over an hour to discuss future improvements to their platform.  I gave them my long wish list.

What do you dislike about vcita?
1. Currently there is no feature to prevent people from cancelling their appointment without a penalty even though the policy states no cancellations within 48 hours.  People can still cancel and are "surprised" when they get invoiced a cancellation fee.  I think there should be a warning pop up for anyone trying to cancel their appointment within 48 hours that says "You are attempting to cancel your appointment within 48 hours. You may incur a cancellation fee as per the cancellation policy.  Do you still wish to continue?"

2. There is no way for patients to book a package of appointments and schedule them all at once.  It would be great if they could pay directly through the vCita widget and book all five appointment/ten appointments at the same time without having to go in and do it one by one like they do now.

3. Sometimes I have openings in my schedule and the widget says I don't.  We've tried to fix it but am not sure why there is a glitch.

Recommendations to others considering vcita:
This is great for healers and coaches growing their business to put on their website.  I highly recommend it to my colleagues who are looking to gain new clients/patients.
